metadata.inclusion:
1. Initiate inclusion mode on the Z-Wave hub.
2. Tap the upper paddle of the dimmer 3 times quickly. The LED indicators will blink to signal communication and remain on for 2 seconds to confirm inclusion
metadata.exclusion:
1. Initiate exclusion mode on the Z-Wave hub.
2. Tap the lower paddle on the dimmer 3 times quickly
3. Your hub will confirm exclusion and the device will disappear from your controller's device list
metadata.reset: 1. Tap-tap-tap’n’hold the upper paddle for at least 10 seconds. The LED indicator will flash to confirm successful reset.
